item.title: Ep.264 - Earthbound Beginnings with Laney Serface
item.description: Sometimes videogames can be... quirky? Today, improviser and baseball enthusiast Laney Serface stops by to discuss her pandemic moment with Earthbound Beginnings (1989) aka Mother... Feed: https://feed.podbean.com/callmebyyourgamepodcast/feed.xml

item.title: SC EP:1203 A Face In My Window
item.description:
Tonight, we're joined by Sherrie and Conner, two guests with incredible stories to share. When Sherrie was just a little girl growing up in rural Georgia, she came face-to-face with something she'll never forget.

a mysterious creature that appeared at her window, tapped on the glass, and motioned for her to come outside. And just last week, Conner had his own chilling encounter near Mt. Whitney in California. He's here tonight, still searching for answers about what really happened... Feed: https://sasquatchchronicles.libsyn.com/rss
